entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Matapedia
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023
